TextView.android:text: According to the juicing experts, by juicing your fruits and vegetables you’re gaining access to critical antioxidants, vitamins, minerals and nutrients that are used to help repair your body and boost your immune system. Here are some other great health benefits: The antioxidants in juices also help detoxify the body and erase the effects of a processed food diet. Fruits and vegetables are jam packed with phytochemicals, which are renown as health promoters and disease preventers. Juices are also considered to be easier to digest than whole foods as your body doesn’t need to break down the juice like it does with other foods.
